name: Blog made in React and Node.js
desc: This project is a blog that allows users to create, delete, update and read articles. Authentication occurs in the middleware, using JWT Token and LocalStorage. The API communicates between the web page and the database that stores all the data.

name: Trousseau made with React
desc: This project is a trousseau that runs on the web and can be easily accessed on many devices. For the web page I used React and the API was made using Node.js. The API makes the communication between the web page and the database that stores all the data.

name: Login Page With Node.js
desc: Login screen developed using the framework 'Express' in Node.js for the server and the database of MongoDB to save user data. The website and styling were done using HTML and CSS.

name: Pomodoro Website
desc: Study site that uses the 'Pomodoro' method. Website developed using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The website consists of a customized timer to improve the effectiveness of your study and a 'To-do' list that helps with scheduling tasks.

name: To-do List With Python
desc: 'To-do' list made using Python. The graphical interface was made using the library 'PyQT' and the data saving was done using the 'Pandas' in a 'csv' file. The 'To-do' list makes it easy to schedule everyday tasks.
